Package databaseConnection

Class ConsumerDBConn

java.lang.Object
databaseConnection.SignupAndLoginExceptions
databaseConnection.ConsumerDBConn
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBconnection
public class ConsumerDBConn extends SignupAndLoginExceptions implements DBconnection
This class provides methods for consumer database operations such as signing up, logging in, querying held cups, and changing account details.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class databaseConnection.SignupAndLoginExceptions

    SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdAlreadyUsedException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.InitialPasswordCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.NotActivateException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordCantEmptyException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException

  • Field Summary

    • ConsumerDBConn

      public ConsumerDBConn() throws SQLException
      Constructs a ConsumerDBConn object and establishes a connection to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

  • Method Details

    • consumerSignUp

      public void consumerSignUp(String ID, String name, String password) throws SQLException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdAlreadyUsedException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException
      Signs up a new consumer with the given ID, name, and password.
      Parameters:
      ID - the consumer's ID.
      name - the consumer's name.
      password - the consumer's password.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdAlreadyUsedException - if the ID is already used.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException - if the password is already used.

    • login

      public void login(String ID, String password) throws SQLException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException
      Logs in a consumer with the given ID and password.
      Parameters:
      ID - the consumer's ID.
      password - the consumer's password.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordWrongException - if the password is incorrect.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.AccountNotExistException - if the account does not exist.

    • queryCupsHolding

      public String queryCupsHolding() throws SQLException
      Queries the cups currently held by the logged-in consumer.
      Specified by:
      queryCupsHolding in interface DBconnection
      Returns:
      a String listing the details of the cups held by the consumer.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(String ID, String newPassword) throws SQLException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException
      Changes the password of the consumer with the given ID to a new password.
      Parameters:
      ID - the consumer's ID.
      newPassword - the new password.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.PasswordAlreadyUsedException - if the new password is already used.

      newName - the new name.

      public void singUpIDCheck(String ID) throws SQLException, SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdAlreadyUsedException
      Checks if the given ID is already used during sign-up.
      Parameters:
      ID - the ID to check.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs.
      SignupAndLoginExceptions.IdAlreadyUsedException - if the ID is already used.
